OOC: Sorry about that, but Tyrael is the only commander. Can you 
prepare some details on his ship?

Tyrael heard the conversation on his communicator, and decided to 
intervene.

Tyrael: Talon, please refrain from further acts. You may own a ship, 
but I am your immediate commander and thus I will decide what ship we 
will use. You were chosen for your immense skills as a pilot, not 
necessarily for your ship. Wait for me and we shall discuss if we will 
take it or not.

A few moments later, he enters the dock tower.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "deltazero1" <DeltaZero1@h...> wrote:
> Talon tapped his icon on his chest and started to speak "Raven get 
> the ship rdy of take off" he said walking into the docking bay a few 
> secs later one of the walls started to slide apart and a large ship 
> towered over all the other ships "and there our ride" he said 
> pointing stright at it"
